ptp-common.description: Configure common information of PTP clock.

domain.description: Configure PTP device domain. Only devices in the same PTP domain can be synchronized.

slave-only.description: Enable/disable slave-only function. If a PTP device serves as an OC, the PTP device can only function as a slave clock.

set-port-state-enable.description: Enable/disable static BMC selection. You can manually configure the interface status of a PTP interface clock source.

access-ctrl-enable.description: Enable/disable access control for BMC selection. Only clock sources in the list of permitted clock sources can participate in BMC selection.

dly-measure-enable.description: Enable/disable auto-measurement of ring-network asymmetry delay of optical fibers. The fiber length change will be tested as the interface connecting to the fiber goes from Down to Up after enabled.

passive-measure-enable.description: Enable/disable performance monitor of a passive interface. If performance monitoring is enabled on passive interfaces and devices remain in a stable time synchronization state, devices will monitor the time offset values (between the master and slave devices) on passive interfaces every 1000s.

passive-alarm-threshold.description: Set passive alarm threshold. After performance monitoring is enabled on passive interfaces, if the time offset value between the master and slave devices exceeds the alarm threshold, an alarm indicating that the passive interface optical fiber length has changed will be reported to the NMS.

current-utc-offset.description: Current offset between the UTC and the TAI.

current-utc-offset-learn.description: Current offset between the UTC and the TAI.

std-time-port.description: Configure an external time interface as the standard time reference port.

eth-std-time-port.description: Configure an Ethernet interface as the absolute standard time interface.

clk-class-alm-thd.description: Clock class threshold of PTP alarm.

offset-sum-alm-thd.description: Indicates the difference threshold of the ptpoffsetsum between max and min during the statistical period.

std-offset-alm-thd.description: PTP standard time offset alarm threshold (ns).

max-steps-removed.description: Configure the max steps removed of time synchronization equipment.

send-gm-wtr.description: Configure the wait-to-restore (WTR) time for the local device to send announce messages carrying GM attributes after the time server recovers, by default, the WTR time is 10.

time-offset-monitor-cycle.description: Configure the timeoffset performance monitoring cycle.

time-stamp-monitor-cycle.description: Configure the timestamp performance monitoring cycle.

ptsf-auto-recover-time.description: Config the auto recover time of PTP PTSF Source. (Unit: minutes)

clock-class-holdoff-time.description: The holdoff time of ptp local clock-class after the clock source fails in G.8275.1 mode, in minutes.

ptp-permit-clk-ids.description: List of configure clock sources that are allowed to participate in BMC selection.

ptp-permit-clk-id.description: Configure clock sources that are allowed to participate in BMC selection.

permit-clkid.description: Number of a clock source. It is a 16-digit hexadecimal number, such as 286ed4fffe466c57.

virtual-clock-id.description: User can configure virtual-clock-id between 1 and 0xffffffff.

local-clock-id.description: Clock ID of the local PTP clock source. It is a 16-digit hexadecimal number, such as 286ed4fffe42f7ca.

time-source.description: Type of the local PTP clock source.

accuracy.description: Accuracy of the local PTP clock source.

clk-class.description: Class of the local PTP clock source.

priority1.description: Priority1 of the local PTP clock source.

priority2.description: Priority2 of the local PTP clock source.

local-priority.description: Local priority of the local PTP clock source.

atr-time-source.description: Type of the ATR clock source.

atr-accuracy.description: Accuracy of the ATR clock source, which is used for BMC algorithm.

atr-clk-class.description: Class of the ATR clock source, which is used for BMC algorithm.

atr-priority1.description: Priority1 of the ATR clock source, which is used for BMC algorithm.

atr-priority2.description: Priority2 of the ATR clock source, which is used for BMC algorithm.

ptp-bits-srcs.description: List of configure PTP BITS clock sources.

bits-switch.description: Enable/disable BITS clock sources can participate in BMC selection. BITS clock sources can participate in BMC selection only when the status is on.

bits-direction.description: Transmission direction of BITS signals. If the signal type is 1PPS, you must specify the input and output directions of BITS signals.

bits-status.description: Status of PTP BITS clock sources.

bits-recv-delay.description: Delay for receiving BITS time signals.

bits-send-delay.description: Delay for sending BITS time signals.

ptp-bits-bmc-attrs.description: Configure BMC parameters for selecting PTP BITS clock sources.

local-priority.description: Local Priority of the BITS clock source in G8275.1 profile.

ptp-bits-bmc-attr.description: Configure BMC parameters for selecting PTP BITS clock sources.

time-source.description: Type of the BITS clock source.

accuracy.description: Accuracy of the BITS clock source.

clk-class.description: Class of the BITS clock source.

priority1.description: Priority1 of the BITS clock source in 1588v2 profile.

priority2.description: Priority2 of the BITS clock source.

gm-clockid.description: Grand master clock ID of BITS clock source. It is a 16-digit hexadecimal number which should be inputted by consumer.

offset-scaled.description: Offset scaled log variance can be configured to be 1: 0xFFFF or 2: 0x4E5D or 3: 0x4B32.

ptp-bits-bmc-learn.description: Statistics of BMC parameters for selecting PTP BITS clock sources.

time-source.description: Type of the BITS clock source.

accuracy.description: Accuracy of the BITS clock source.

clk-class.description: Class of the BITS clock source.

priority1.description: Priority1 of the BITS clock source in 1588v2 profile.

priority2.description: Priority2 of the BITS clock source.

gm-clockid.description: Grand master clock ID of BITS clock source. It is a 16-digit hexadecimal number which should be inputted by consumer.

offset-scaled.description: Offset scaled log variance can be configured to be 1: 0xFFFF or 2: 0x4E5D or 3: 0x4B32.

ptp-grand-master-attr.description: Statistics of the current master clock.

master-clock-id.description: Number of the current master clock. It is a 16-digit hexadecimal number, such as 286ed4fffe42f7ca.

recv-src-name.description: Name of the interface to which the current master clock accesses.

step-removed.description: Number of hops between the master clock and a local device.

time-source.description: Type of the current master clock.

accuracy.description: Accuracy of the current master clock. It is a two-digit hexadecimal number, such as 0x20.

clk-class.description: Class of the current master clock.

priority1.description: Priority1 of the current master clock.

priority2.description: Priority2 of the current master clock.

gm-utc-offset.description: UTC offset of the current master clock.

gm-utc-offset-valid.description: Enable/disable the UTC offset of the current master clock.

gm-timescale.description: Timescale of the current master clock.

gm-time-traceable.description: Enable/disable time trace. If enabled, the time of the current master clock source can be traced.

gm-leap.description: Leap value of the current master clock.

gm-freq-traceable.description: Enable/disable frequency trace. If enabled, the frequency of the current master clock can be traced.

gm-offset-scaled.description: Clock stability of the current master clock.

sync-uncertain.description: Enable/disable synchronization uncertain status of the current master clock.

ptp-port-deviation-sigs.description: List of statistics of gps signalings of PTP port.

ptp-port-deviation-sig.description: Statistics of gps signalings of PTP port.

src-name.description: Name of a PTP interface clock source.

ptp-active-lic-slots.description: List of configure the 1588v2 license for the board.

active-lic-slot.description: Slot ID of the board activated with the 1588v2 license.

ifname.description: Name of a PTP interface clock source.

port-recv-announce.description: Number of Announce packets received on a PTP port.

port-recv-sync.description: Number of Sync packets received on a PTP port.

port-recv-req.description: Number of Request packets received on a PTP port.

port-recv-resp.description: Number of Response packets received on a PTP port.

port-recv-pdresp-followup.description: Number of Pdelay Response FollowUp packets received on a PTP port.

port-recv-followup.description: Number of FollowUp packets received on a PTP port.

port-send-announce.description: Number of Announce packets sent on a PTP port.

port-send-sync.description: Number of Sync packets sent on a PTP port.

port-send-req.description: Number of Request packets sent on a PTP port.

port-send-resp.description: Number of Response packets sent on a PTP port.

port-send-followup.description: Number of FollowUp packets sent on a PTP port.

port-send-pdresp-followup.description: Number of Pdelay Response FollowUp packets sent on a PTP port.

port-discard-announce.description: Number of Announce packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-sync.description: Number of Sync packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-delayreq.description: Number of Delay Req packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-pdelayreq.description: Number of Pdelay Req packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-resp.description: Number of Response packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-pdelayresp.description: Number of Pdelay Response packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-followup.description: Number of FollowUp packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-pdrespfollowup.description: Number of Pdelay Response FollowUp packets discarded on a PTP port.

ptp-port-passive-stat.description: Statistics of the passive port performance of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-max.description: Maximum time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-min.description: Minimum time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-mean.description: Average time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-cur.description: Current time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-pts-capabilitys.description: List of statistics of capability of time synchronization at PTP port.

port-pts-capability.description: Statistics of capability of time synchronization at PTP port.

max-t2-minus-t1.description: Max value of T2 minus T1.

min-t2-minus-t1.description: Min value of T2 minus T1.

port-discard-resp.description: Number of Response packets discarded on a PTP port.

port-discard-pdrespfollowup.description: Number of Pdelay Response FollowUp packets discarded on a PTP port.

ptp-port-passive-stat_schema.description: Statistics of the passive port performance of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-max.description: Maximum time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-min.description: Minimum time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-mean.description: Average time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-ps-timeoffset-cur.description: Current time offset value of the passive port of the PTP clock.

port-pts-capabilitys_schema.description: List of statistics of capability of time synchronization at PTP port.

port-pts-capability.description: Statistics of capability of time synchronization at PTP port.

max-t2-minus-t1.description: Max value of T2 minus T1.

min-t2-minus-t1.description: Min value of T2 minus T1.
